A short, elderly woman slowly stepped out with the aid of a cane. She had long flowing grey hair that brushed against her shoulders and piercing green eyes. She was thin but not overly so and wore clothing from a past era making you guess she did not get out much. You watched as she frowned at her garden before sighing, a tear falling from her eye. It was then you decided to try to help and caught her attention by waving. "Would you like some help with your garden, miss?" Kindly, you asked. "I'm quite handy."

The woman smiled sadly. "I don't have much money to offer, young man." Tearfully, she replied.

"I'm not asking for any." Taking a step to the gate, you said. "May I approach?"

The elderly woman was visibly surprised as she nodded and you walked up to her garden and surveyed the damage. "It's not bad, really." Lightly, you said. "It just needs a little attention."

With that said, you got to work, weeding the garden and turning the soil. You were actually quite gifted when it came to gardening and within an hour, the garden was beautiful and full of life once again with a variety of flowers you had ran out and brought back from your own house. The old woman was overjoyed to see her garden lush again and rewarded you with a grateful smile.

"Thank you, young man." Smiling, she said. "It's been a while since I saw the garden come to life so beautifully." She paused. "I must ask, though; why did you do this for a perfect stranger?"

You shrugged. "It just seemed to be the right thing to do." Lightly, you replied. "No one deserves to be all alone, ma'am."

Again, the elderly woman rewarded you with a smile. "What is your name, if I may ask?"

"John." Kindly, you said. "John Joe. My friends call me J.J."

The woman smiled. "My name is Leia Thorn." Softly, she said. "How would you like to help me around my house. Upkeep, cleaning, and general company?" She giggled slightly. "I can offer you something far greater than money for your services."

You were not sure what to make of the Leia's offer. Still, you came this far, offering to help her with her garden. You sort of expected her to ask for more and, since she had little money, she would of course offer something else in return for services. What do you say?

141.content:
Sarah ran as fast as she could. Thunder rumbled through a red-stained sky, lightning the sole source of light in this mockery of the real world.

Sarah ran, but there was no way she could be fast enough.

******

Three hours earlier, the sun was shining on another boring neighborhood garage sale. Sarah's mom, Susan, loved going to these sorts of sales, always talking about the next major find. Sarah worried that if and when her Dad died that her Mom was going to turn into a hoarder. Unfortunately for Sarah, Susan had been her ride to the mall, and spotting the sign for the sale on the side of the road, the two had taken an unscheduled detour. Sarah, now terribly bored and late to meet up with her friends, texted on her phone, trying and failing to hide her irritation.

She rolled her eyes as she saw her Mom talking with Mrs. Applebee. An elderly widow from the neighborhood, she and Susan had bonded over their shared love of these sales. And now that those two were talking, it was doubtless going to be a very long day.

Sarah began to make her way along the tables, figuring if she had time to kill, she might as well take a look at the items for sale. God, I need to get my own car, Sarah thought as she walked past tables of 8 tracks, old bell bottom jeans, and a whole heaping pile of bling. It looks like the 70's threw up on their front lawn. I mean, they can't seriously expect to sell this crap, can they? Who even owns an 8 track player anymore?

One item on the bling table did manage to catch her eye. It looked like an old oil lamp. Constructed of brass and colored glass, with highlights that appeared to be made of gold, it was a bright and colorful piece. As the light shone through it, lighting the table under it in a rainbow of color, Sarah decided she had to have it. There wasn't a price tag on it, though.

"Excuse me, sir," Sarah waved the elderly man tending the table over. "How much for this?"

"Well, the gold chains are twenty, the earrings ar-"

"No, not those," Sarah interrupted. "I meant this."

The old man seemed confused. "What?"

Sarah pointed at the lamp. "The lamp."

The old man looked where Sarah was pointing, confusion evident on his face. Finally, in irritation, he said, "Look, if you ain't gonna buy anything, get lost. I ain't got time fer games."

Sarah watched the old man leave, and looked at the lamp. Could he not see it, Sarah thought. Of course, that was preposterous. Outside of fantasy and make believe, there was nothing that was actually invisible. Right? Sarah reached down to pick up the lamp.

Her hand passed through it like it wasn't even there.

She gasped and snatched her hand back. The lamp rapidly lost its solid appearance, getting more and more blurry until it seemed more vapor then anything else. Once in its gaseous state, it leaped towards Sarah's face. She fell back with a gasp, and as she inhaled, the lamp smoke flowed into her lungs. She tried to stop it, to scream, anything, but it felt as if time itself had stopped. She was vaguely aware that she hadn't even hit the ground yet. She could see her Mom, dropping the record she'd been looking at and starting to run towards her daughter. Like everything else, she seemed frozen in mid-stride, and the colors seemed... wrong. Too bright, and too many, and too dull, and too few. Just, simply, wrong.

Sarah tried to breathe, and found she couldn't. She felt her oxygen starved mind clouding over. Am I dying...
141.title: A lamp

1411.content:
Sarah woke up with a gasp. Heaving painfully, she rolled over and waited for the taste of bile to leave her mouth. The world spun painfully, and she shut her eyes until her mind remembered which way was up and which was down.

What the hell was that!?

Sarah unsteadily rose to her feet. She was still at the garage sale, but it definitely wasn't right. For starters, there was nobody there. All the people were gone, her Mom, her neighbors, even Mrs. Applebee's little dog, they were simply gone. The clothes they'd been wearing were on the ground where they'd been standing. Feathers, all that remained of the passing birds, floated down from the sky like rain, and Sarah could see Chester's leash by Mrs. Applebee's cardigan.

And it was quiet! Perfectly, totally quiet. Sarah had never noticed the degree of background noise she was accustomed too. Only now that it was gone, the cars, the people, the music, the kids, only now did she know what true silence sounded like. Only her breathing broke this unnatural stillness.

As she looked up, she saw the sky had turned a blood red color, staining the world below it an abnormal hue. No sun stood vigil in this foreign sky. The moon, however, had company, and now three pale faces looked upon a world turned upside down. Sarah felt frightened but, to her credit, not panicky. You first notice the expansion in your rear, along with the increasing strain of your pants. Your butt slowly fills with fat, still staying firm, until it si probably 3 inches larger all around, looking like that of a models. It jiggles with the slightest movement.

Entranced by your new booty, you fail to notice the expansion in your chest until the class of your bra brakes. Gasping, you look down, amazed by the new, vast valley of cleavage. You get up, and move to the attic mirror to really get a good look at yourself.

You pull off blanket covering the mirror, and soak it all in; luckily most of the fat had gone to your butt, hips, and breasts. But you still had a little pooch that had formed with the new weight, but it still really looked good.

You look at the book, thinking. Maybe more weight would look better? Or is it time to show off the new you?
Your chest was n
142311.title: A Little Extra in all the right places

choices: Your clothes still fit you, somehow...
The diary's slipped out of your pudgy hands, and onto the ground.
142312.content:
You decide on making yourself just a touch less thin. This is a wishing book afterall, whatever you do can't be perminent, without some pre-wishing of such traits. Still, it'd seem paper isn't as forgiving of typos as something more modern would be.

Namely, in the dominion of making yourself a touch fatter than you anticipated, and then some.

The process seems to begin as quickly as you wrote your ill concieved wish down, an overwhelming warmness returning to not just your chest and bottom, but your entire soon-to-be bulky body. What once were average arms become as thickened as a thinner person's thigh, your thighs touching to an almost absurd degree by the time the sizing process is done... Though of course, ether of your even more sizable assets are now resting on a mammothed middle, your current figure looking as though it ate the thinner one from earlier, a couple times over.

Luckily, or unluckily you're still on your feet after the process concludes, wobbling some in place as you glance at the now more-so limited vision your portly frame allows for, each motion sending a tingly jiggle through your now fat packed visage. Ether of your hands is clutched in a soft fist, even your cheeks soft enough to seem 'fat' whilst you try to peer past your middle, and towards your previously out in the open feet, to no avail.

Frustrated, you just elect to sit down, the motion causing a little bit of the wood that composed the attic to creak under your weight, or just due to such being displaced more-so. Things obviously didn't go too well, and you seem appalled, and a bit disgusted overall by your new figure, especially how awkward it feels to lug your softer bits around. The most you seem to utter for now is occasional wheezes, and angered utterances, none the least of which sound a little muffled thanks to your softer face parts.

Though, at this moment you seem to realize something else, aside from how ridiculously fat you've gotten yourself...
142312.title: Accidental Adipose...

choices: To see if others react to your newfound size.
To wish for something that would alter the recent past.
1423121.content:
It's a minor detail for sure, but obviously something odd. You hadn't really been paying attention earlier, though you likely had been left with accommodating attire for your newer assets, as well. On-top of that, a couple of other details seem added to your attire, including the occasional food stain.

You just set a soft hand onto your now doubled chin, ether article sinking into the softness of the other for a moment whilst you attempt to make sense of the situation. An obvious conclusion is that the diary alters past events, though in this case it might just be cosmetic. Your former frustrated noise grows into something more curious, various 'hmms' dawning on you as you decide how exactly you should be testing the book within your mitts.

After further deliberation, and panting, you decide that the best method to find out how the diary's wishes work would be...
1423121.title: Suspiciously Sizing

choices: You should head downstairs, there's food, and family there...
Hm. Maybe you could just wish up some food?
14231211.content:
With the effort one could only assume weightlifters expend when they pull bars over their heads, you lug your size into a standing position, and lug your way out of the attic. It's a noisy endeavor, though luckily your large chest allows you to simply slot your magic book inside, for safe keeping.

Ether way, you aren't quite having an amazing time, the steps leading back down looking to be much more precarious, with 300 extra pounds to lug along with every step. You make it down unharmed however, if a bit sweaty from all this 'moving' business, eventually pushing the attic stairs back up, and acting as though you were slowly going about your day.

Stop number one should be your room, though the long hallway towards it feels like an eternity, even though nobody seems to disrupt your after school lumbering for the moment. Sadly, no other family members are around whenever you peer into your much less spacious room. Well, more 'yourself taking up more room' than the room being smaller, but the effect feels similar to your bloated bodyparts anyways. A brief glance reveals that some things are different, but the overall composition is strangely similar. For one thing, your nightstand has a minifridge perched atop it's originally alarm and lamp filled surface, ether of those now on a fold-up table, that looked just the right height for you to do homework, or have a meal on.

Otherwise, posters and other stuff are the same, even down to the oddly colored carpeting, the whole place just feeling like a weird afterimage of your previous abode. You just idly brush some hair out of your face, your middle rumbling with quite a bit of force while you just elect to close your room's slightly wider door for the moment. Today has been weird, so you simply take a breather, belatedly wiping sweat from your brow before you feel your gurgling be replaced by an ebbing hunger...
14231211.title: Wishing is Wishy Washy Business

choices: Your gut starts to hurt a little, huh?
There's suddenly a knocking on your wide room's door...
142312112.content:
This might just be your new fat covered 'lazy bones' talking, though quite the idea pops into your soft head. You take a seat at your apparently creak-worthy bed, a backpack that you'd tosses aside looking to have more widely adjusted shoulder straps as you both glance around the room, and get yourself properly situated. Once close to your bed's fold out desk, you simply procure your safely hidden book, and tap the other end of your pen onto some of the papery surface inside.

At first you just want to test the waters, though quickly you realize you could wish for any meal you've ever wanted... You lick at your lips with a slightly bottled anticipation, finding some room on the page you were previously writing on to begin to plot out your wish. You settle for a classic, some cake; your noisy middle making more noise from under your table as you begin to fully scribble down your intentions.

I wish I had some cake.

It's a simple bit of text, though you feel proud of yourself for thinking up such a simple solution. Unless this book runs out of paper, you'd likely be using it for a lot of stuff like this in the future... You just twiddle your thumbs a little, this wish seeming to be taking a bit longer than usual, hm.
142312112.title: Give them an inch, they take a meal...

choices: You just add a 'yesterday' to your last wish, easy.
Maybe you can wish your stomach into being bigger?
1423121121.content:
All of a sudden, a surge of pain dawns onto your now much more globular stomach...The thing brushes against the bottom of your metallic table, and heavily sloshes whilst you take more labored huffs than before. When going to grab at some of the exposed surface to see what was wrong, you felt occasional spatterings of icing added to your middle, the stuff even on your hands, and the rest of you, as if you'd been coated in the stuff this whole time.

As a side effect, your wish granting diary seemed to have the occasional cakey hand-print too, a low groan escaping your mouth as you try to piece together why you were so full.

It eventually dawns on you that since you didn't specify a time, you likely had 'some cake' earlier, much like how you presumably got this fat earlier in life too. Regardless, you don't feel too good at the moment, just eyeing the book on your table whilst your middle cries bloody murder, due to the absurdity of it's contents as of now. At least this gives you further insight into the sheer details the diary you're holding can alter. But, even then it might be a good idea to undo what you've just done, so you aren't fit to loose your lunch, come dinner time...

Speaking of, it might be a good idea to brainstorm what you want to do, before you pass out into some kind of food coma.
1423121121.title: Can't have your cake, and eat it too

choices: Just get some sleep. Future you can deal with all this stuff, right?
Waddle your way downstairs, at the very least to get cleaned up...
14231211212.content:
It seems like sound logic, at least at first. A bigger stomach should be able to hold more food, which in this case would solve your sweet yet bitterly full problems.

Though whilst you fumble with your lightly sticky hands, and write out the basic phrase of:

'I wish my stomach was bigger'

you begin to realize that this might not be the best of wordings... In monkey paw fashion, your wish seems to just backfire in the worst way possible, in this case your taut stomach just getting even bigger around, and oozing a little onto the ground, the rest of you widening as well, as if to justify such a change. On-top of it all, you're still full, though admittedly a little less so, your properly porky gut just keeping you sunk into your seating position, as you struggle to unwedge yourself from the desk.

Almost as quickly as your stomach gets bigger though, the room becomes even more drastically changed. Your desk is now pushed a bit higher up,and closer to yourself, now only really fit for holding foodstuff, given the lack of clear surface area to look at and write on. Your frame is in even baggier clothes, though of course they're tight against your full middle, and other bodyparts. Ether of your fleshy arms just lay a little limp on ether side of your table, your choices seeming ironically slim, given you don't want to risk damaging the diary with your sticky mitts, or bumbling movements.

You just abruptly push the table a little, a mighty creak following yourself standing up, as your middle oozes enough to almost cover your knees... Given recent events, you find it best to:
14231211212.title: A portly choice of words

choices: Your form looks strangely appealing... Maybe you should stay like this?
You reaffirm your disgust, and probably should undo this nonsense soon...
142312112122.content:
Soon, you're very slowly waddling outside. It wasn't easy to swing yourself out of bed, but at least now the process of walking felt a little more interesting. Well, what with the stomach sloshing, admittedly soothing strained muscles a little better than your own sticky handed belly rubs were doing.

That being considered, now was the moment of truth, as to whether anyone noticed your sudden size. You slowly decent what's effectively a spiral staircase, the stairs for now a visual representation of your wish filled downward spiral, the book back in your ever so slightly bigger chest, so as to prevent the thing from just being lost. It was quite the package, even with a pen attached via a chain, which for now felt cold against ether bit of your cleavage whilst you thundered down the occasional decline.

Once downstairs, and within your livingroom, nobody seems to bat much of an eye at your lowly waddling, your name and some hellos being thrown about, but not too much more. There's a general fragrance of food about, the many noises associated with cooking gushing out with as much vigor from the nearby kitchen as the smells were. Your sock covered feet just take the occasional step, until you cram yourself into the bathroom, to wipe your hands and other articles off.

It's one of the major rooms that's still the same, all the others seemingly built from more robust materials, as though your weight had some destructive properties on normal grade woods, for instance. You just give your wide from a glance in the mirror, whilst you let your middle push under the bathroom's sink, washing your hands of your apparent cake eating, as you get a decent look at yourself.

Speaking, of, hm, you're not sure what to think of what you see.
142312112122.title: Put one foot in front of the blubber...

choices: It's your sister; she seems peeved that you're 'hogging the bathroom, too'.
Seems your butt was just bumping against the door? Huh, weird.
1423121121221.content:
It's an odd conclusion, though you just seem to be so much, fuller. Before you were almost a twig, though now your figure has quite the grandiose property to it, as if it's more important, or even just flat out better in general.

Obviously, lugging all your weight around is another story, though that's not something wishes couldn't help you out with... Perhaps you could just make yourself stronger, or e-

Your thoughts are interrupted by a loud knocking on the door, water still running, and one of your damp hands giving your middle light touches whilst you were talking, weird... You'd locked the door, out of a general fear, though now might be a much better opportunity to see what your family thinks of your self appointed size. You fumble around to turn the water off, and dry your hands onto your copious shirt, slowly rotating around whilst your middle sloshed. All the while, you glance behind you to see if something actually was by the door...
1423121121221.title: An adipositive body outlook

choices: Accept the meal; surely you can fit a little more...
Try to decline; you're just really weirded out, and full.
14231211212211.content:
Upon hearing the complaining, you simply peer the door open, only to get a good look at your sibling doing the telltale 'dance of impatience'. IE, attempting to hold some stuff in, yourself having quite a bit of trouble scooting past her, whilst she just looms over you, and scoffs a little. "Ugh; come on tubs, you've got a toilet upstairs for crying out loud!" your older, and taller sister just giving you a light push out of the way, before closing the door back up, and huffing. You're left with a similar reaction, especially to the 'toilet upstairs' bit, you really didn't remember there being something like that in your house, though it would be mighty useful as of now. Your mother is heard adding "Now now, that's no way to treat your sister." Whilst you brush some of your frame off...

You weren't sure if this version of your sister was just kidding around, though for now it might be a better idea to just play it safe, and assume things are more different than just with your clothes sizes. You make your slightly cleaner way to the kitchen after a while, wondering if anything there's different as well, a morbid curiosity, and at this point obesity driving your forward.

Suddenly, you're just pinched some in one of your especially soft cheeks, your mother emitting a low 'aw', whilst adding "Honey, don't feel too down, now. You're just a little bigger boned, is all." a bit of a tap on your shoulder setting you into a wobbly stupor, whilst you try to regain your bearings. You don't remember yourself being sugar coated onto so much, especially from your mother... "Though, I know you'd looove some dinner, right dear?" a heaping plate of uh, lots of stuff, being placed at a similarly big chair at the table.

You're a little unsure what to do next, plus your cheek hurts, ugh...
14231211212211.title: The fattest of chances

choices: Weight (er, 'wait') it out, hopefully it's easy to tell when you're full...
Try to sit up! You're already fat enough, without all this breakfa(s)t.
142312112122111.content:
Perhaps it was due to the overwhelming scent of food in the room, or your mother's coddling, though you find yourself a little over-eager to waddle onto your sizable seat. Your steps are quite slow despite said excitement, and your mother seems more than willing to help your pace along.

Your ample behind gets a slight push, before you're slotted into the reinforced furniture, your gut still basically replacing your lap, and wobbling close to the ground whilst you struggle to reach at the mound of foodstuff... After occasional (and somewhat embarrassing) grunt filled extensions of ether of your arms, your mother grabs at ether appendage, and instead twirls a food coated in foodstuff infront of your face. "You need help, hun? That's fine, just open wide-" your mother pressing the fork of stuff into your mouth a bit forcefully.

The resulting explosion of sheer flavors made you a lot less mad than you should be, it being a breakfast for dinner sort of getup, except with an ungodly stack of pancakes, and other breakfast foods all slathered in what likely was a gallon of sweetened syrup...

Before you can really react, another forkful is in your mouth, a rhythm building up after a while, despite your middle becoming more and more taut with each syrup dripping bite you gulped down. If you weren't so intoxicated by food, you'd be willing to reason your mother's behavior, is why you've wound up so 'fat' in this sequence of events... Still, she feels almost cookie cutter, your lack of breath to ever say anything back not helping much in this instance. Your formerly hanging middle starts to have it's exposed underbelly touch at the cold kitchen floor, whilst you occasionally wobble, by now pinned down by your mother's presence, the table, and all the food in your stomach...
142312112122111.title: Getting the bigger picture

choices: Mention needing to go to the bathroom! Assuming you'd still fit there...
Just scribble a wish now! Something supernatural should do the trick.
1423121121221111.content:
After what feels like a gulp filled eternity, you're finally done! Groans, and the occasional glance at your syrup coated face, and chest seem to signify a meal well had for your mother, whilst she gives your especially taut glob of a stomach slow rubs, the circular motions almost making the stuff wobble in place, but not quite.

"There, better? You can have some leftovers later, I promise." reddish lips giving your somehow softened forehead a peck, whilst a mild 'eugh' sound in the background hints that your older sister is afoot. Before a family talk can take place, she slinks upstairs, yourself not nearly as lucky as a torrent of occasional pecks and pinches befell your bloated mass.

It'd be nice in small doses, but a lot like the meal you just had, it's sickeningly sweet, and seems to leave a tinge of heartburn in your stomach after the fact. A firm hand and moist towel clean your face, hair, and other syrupy bits before you're ushered upwards, and slowly drag yourself, and your too full to walk around middle to get yourself into some sleeping clothes.

You would admit all the spoiling was nice, yourself practically the center of attention, luckily not from being heavy enough to be a gravity well. Though at the same time, your still hazed demeanor snaps into cold nervousness once you realize the diary is still tucked away in your chest...

You still want the thing as a get out of jail free card, though it might be better to take things in a more casual manner, to avoid suspicion...
1423121121221111.title: The Doted Doughball Daughte- er, you.

choices: You could wish to already be in pajamas, perhaps...
Perhaps wishing the book into your room would make things better?
14231211212211111.content:
After a bit of stomach gurgling cuts your original attempt off, you mention needing to head to the 'big' ladies room, more or less. Despite your mother adding the occasional 'are you sure?' to the exchange, she eventually lets you squeeze your way back into the room, despite being close-by the door in case you needed help. Because of this you can't exactly lock the door, but amusingly enough you make a nice barricade, all things considered.

You leave the sink running for a little bit, and plop onto the toilet seat itself, your bottom almost enveloping the bowl in porcine flesh. You're still in some clothes, but that can't really hide a lot of the more broad motions your flabby figure makes. Though, other than buying yourself some time, you're not too sure what you should be doing right now. The thoughts of 'eat the diary' and other such things aren't exactly helpful, not would they work in this case, especially with how stuffed to the gills you are, thanks to a certain someone.
14231211212211111.title: Beached in the Bathroom

choices: It just fell into the ground, phew!
You don't see the dairy anywhere, this could be bad...
142312112122111112.content:
It's an odd idea, but it would make this situation less awkward. You just slowly tug the book from your chest, the article a touch sticky, but ultimately not damaged. As a matter of fact, the syrup that was present on the outside covers didn't seem to affect how any pages slid together, or turned, your meaty hands taking you back to your spot on the first page before long.

I wish this book was in my room right now...

Is what you briefly jot down, your letter alignment a little off, though the book doesn't seem to mind 'that' as apposed to obvious human errors from earlier. Though magic was a practice of double standards, one would assume, the book before long just vanishing, with yourself no longer in the bathroom, and instead just mid-changing, with your mother. This is the first time a wish directly affected where you were, though at least it made it so that you didn't have to head out of the bathroom, instead in your room, some almost mockingly pink attire being tugged onto your fatness whilst you wobble, and just seem awkward about the whole situation. Sure, the movements felt nice, though being dressed at your age wasn't really the most endearing of things, even with say, 400 extra pounds onto your frame...

You can almost taste the 'awws' and other noises pushed your way, before your almost pig-suited self is left to slumber, some blankets over your bulk whilst a minor 'bedtime snack' of a meal or two is upon your previously book covered table... Wait, er, the book was there whilst you were getting changed, no?
142312112122111112.title: A page of discovery

choices: The night goes rather well, too; though the next morning is a different story...
Whilst slumbering, there's a disturbance that rouses your 'hibernation'...
1423121121221111122.content:
Your already strained heart almost skips a beat, as you realize that you're left without any sort of proper amending at your disposal; though, at the same time not having your magical wishy washy paper holder on-hand might be the least of your worries... For one, you seem to be a little stuck in your re-enforced bed, the occasional attempt to move your trunk-carrying junk from your comfy blanketed prison being moot, for all except making your gut look like a watery practical effect, or something similar...

Your efforts just devolve into exhaustion, and eventual slumber, your day having had been eventful, but surprisingly tiring, all things considered. Besides, as much as there's a sizable pang of dread within your chest, the bed is incredibly comfortable, likely because of all the pillowy adipose between you, and your already thick covers... On a closer inspection of such, however; the patterns upon your blankets seem different all-together, instead of some plain, solid pattern, something with a lot more vibrancy, it being hard for you to put your finger on the color that's on display, especially with how dark your room is at the moment. Blinds are currently drawn up within your room to emulate night-time, as it still was late afternoon, though you're already tired anyways, so you just snooze, freshly fluffed hair at either of your sides as your gut's sizable breaths become slower, and you eventually worry less about books, and more about feeling well rested in the morning...

It might occur to you that you hadn't touched your meal as of now, though as greedy as this version of your body is, you'd really rather tackle issues with enough energy to have clear thoughts, and well, actually leave your bed, for starters.
1423121121221111122.title: Nowhere you look, there's a book...

choices: And now for something completely different
14231211212211111222.content:
You wouldn't have thought that you could fall asleep before 7 o'clock at night, especially with your fears about the location of the only thing that could make you thin again. However, the sheer quantity you'd eaten, combined with the energy draining nature of the greedy, corpulent form you now had, left you far more tired then you'd initially anticipated.

Knowing how important it was to find the book, you tried standing up to search for it one last time. Your heart wasn't in it, though, and your food quadruplets hurt as you tried to shift even slightly. After a rather pitiful and half-hearted effort, you gave up, flopping back and causing your massively oversized belly to wobble like gelatin. Even without exerting yourself to the fullest, you were breathing heavily, and you could see a shiny layer of perspiration on the caramel skin exposed between the buttons of your top, straining to hold in all of your blubbery majesty.

"Holy Christ," you thought, shocked by just how out of shape this body is. "Well, I probably shouldn't be surprised. Just looking at the size of this body, it's clear This-Me considers drinking a milkshake out of a heavy glass strenuous exercise."

As you struggled to keep your eyelids open, you yawned and thought, "Oh, to hell with it for now. I'm too tired to go hunting for that book at the moment. It'll still be... whereever it is, when I get up."

"Besides," you think with a blush, "I'm not sure I can get up right now. Definitely going to find it tomorrow, though..."

Another yawn leaves your mouth as your eyelids flutter shut, and you drift off to sleep with a light snore.

*** *** ***


Growl.

You find yourself slowly being drawn awake by a deep, low sound, a gentle quaking, and an unusual hollow feeling.

Ggggggrrrrrroooowwwwwwlllll.

As you regain consciousness, you see and feel the magnificent spread of your body around you. A few tentative touches confirms the lardy nature of your fatty flesh, putting to rest any doubts that what had transpired was a strange dream.

GGGGGGGGGGGGRRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWWWWWLLLLLLLLLLLLL!!!

Even your sleepy mind had no trouble realizing what had driven you awake, as your stomach was anything but subtle. You couldn't honestly remember the last time you'd felt this hungry, and you knew ignoring this wasn't going to be an option. Reaching out with your right hand, you flicked on your bedside light. You hadn't thought it was possible, but you somehow managed to look even bigger in the half-light of the lamp. Your plump breasts were bigger then your head, and sloped off your crushing dome of a gut. Your vastly overstretched stomach, grown from both your Mom's coddling and your own boundless greed, demanded sustenance.

Remembering your struggles to rise before, you felt a brief moment of fear, wondering how you could possibly get something to fill your titanic belly. However, as it turned out, you needn't have worried.

You'd forgotten about the food your Mom set on the table to your left, "Just in case." You were already drooling as you grabbed the first bag off the top of the impressive pile your Enabler of a Mother had left you. You barely noticed the weight of the heavy, drooping rolls of fat hanging down from your arm, nor how they dragged across your thoroughly crushed mattress and well fattened back rolls, such was your desire to fill your bottomless maw.

The first bag was stuffed full of jumbo beef and cheese burritos, with extra cheese and sour cream. Even cold, they were delicious, and you punctuated each bite with a loud coo. Even though you were slightly tilted forward, eating these was a messy business. Bits of meat and cheese constantly fell out of the soft shell, and you spent a good deal of time between each burrito picking all the slopped food off your straining pj's, stretched to the max over your flabby torso.

All too soon, your burritos were gone. Pushing the empty bag and wrappers to the floor, your reached over for the next item in your food pile - an extra large pepperoni pizza, thin crust, with triple cheese and triple pepperoni. Even in the low light of your lamp, you could see the shine of grease on the cold 'zza. Six burritos, it seemed, barely sufficed as an appetizer, and you wiped a bit of drool off your chin as you began to scarf down slice after slice. Before long, you were dual wielding slices, eating so quickly you occasionally needed to stop and take a deep breath to replenish your oxygen.

As you devoured the greasy pie, your suffering pajamas had finally had enough. With a loud couple of pops, a pair of buttons which had been straining to keep your gelatinous, towering belly flew off into the ether. You giggled as you heard them rattle off a random wall or the floor. As you resumed your midnight feast with renewed gusto, you felt another button or two give up the ghost.

"Holy... shit..." you thought, gleefully stuffing yourself. "I'm... so... fucking... fat..."

As you pushed the last slice into your impossibly greedy maw, you grabbed every piece of meat and cheese stuck to the bottom of the box, refusing to waste a single precious calorie. Your fingers were already shining from the pizza and Tex Mex, yet you were still hungry. Sending the box to join the wrappers on the floor, you reached for the last package with a loud groan. You felt as though you pulled a muscle, but as long as you got your prize, you couldn't have cared less.

Finally getting a grip on it, you plopped it onto your flabby chest and opened the plastic. Grinning, you licked your greasy lips as you gazed at twelve gooey cinnamon buns, covered with a thick layer of cream cheese. You could scarcely blink before your chubby hands were tearing great chunks of goodness from this wonderful box, trying to desperately fill your ever hungry belly. Not a speck of bun or creme went to waste, as you used your fingers to wipe up every little thing, slurping it off your fingers.

Pushing the rather clean box to your garbage heap on the floor, you looked over your expansive, now happily stuffed, belly. You were pinned under the heart shaped and double rolled monster, and such was the thickness of your blubber that, regardless of how hard you pushed, you couldn't feel your full stomach at all. Jiggling your flabby ocean of flesh, you giggled as, once again, another weakened button let go.

"God, I'm so God damn fat. Has anyone my age ever been this big before? I mean, no wonder This-Me is so huge, if she's always eating like this. I just ate 5 or 6,000 calories without even moving out of bed. Heck, I could still eat more..."

A sudden bolt of inspiration hit, and you reached above your head. In your normal world, you had a chocolate stash in your headboard cupboard, and sure enough, this "you" did as well. Wrapping your hand around a couple of king sized Twix bars, you opened the sweet treats and languidly savored the delicious little morsels.

As you softly chewed, you admired the massive spread of your overfed body, stretching from one side of your queen sized bed to the other, burying it under your suffocating mass. "I feel like a total Hutt. I should get Han Solo in carbonite for my wall. I wonder how much I actually weigh now? And how much could I actually eat if I really, really pushed myself? Course, it seems like Mom has that number memorized, and how she can keep it going up."

As you bit into another bar, you checked the time. "Oh, wow, it's almost three in the morning. I should get some sleep. This is actually a lot of fun, but I can't stay like this forever. I don't even know if I can get out of bed by myself. I'll definitely need to find that diary tomorrow. Although, at least I can play around like this whenever I want once I find it, heh, heh, heh. I should see if I can find a scale that can stand my weight, too. That would be so hot."

Finishing your twix, you flicked off the light. As you slowly drifted off to sleep, you casually wondered what you should have for breakfast in the morning...

*** *** ***


Who wakes you up in the morning?
14231211212211111222.title: No rest for the Fat and Hungry

choices: And now for something completely different
142312112122111112222.content:
"... Fuck."

Emily didn't know what else to say as she looked over her beached whale of a sister.

"Like... just.... fuuuuuck."

The two sisters had been born a year apart, with Emily as the elder. In their youth, the two had looked a lot alike. Same straight black hair, same dimply smile, same freckly caramel skin. They'd been totally inseparable as kids, and both had been a little chubby, thanks to a doting mother and both possessing a wicked sweet tooth.

Well, perhaps they'd been more then a little chubby. That said, their mutual paths in life had diverged about three or four years ago, when Melanie had been a little slip of a girl, at least when compared to what she is now.

Emily had hit her growth spurt just as she was entering middle school. At the same time, she began playing for both the volleyball and soccer teams, and her weekends were spent with her friends on the basketball court. Such an active lifestyle had seen Emily slim down significently. The 17 year old stood at 5'9", weighed 120 pounds give or take, and clearly had a runner's physique. No one who saw her in her gym shorts would fail to notice her firm, well muscled thighs, and she knew she was considered one of the top catches of her high school, though she wasn't the sort to let that go to her head.

Melanie, however, couldn't have been more of her sister's opposite.

As much as Emily wanted to place sole blame on their mother's endless coddling, she knew that Mel had always been the more greedy and gluttonous of the two. She was always the first to finish her plate, always the first to ask for seconds, always the first to get her dessert and, if you weren't quick enough, liable to eat all of it before you got a slice.

This, in part, was why Emily was just as heavy as Melanie growing up, if not more so. Emily had always been quite competitive, and the thought of missing out on another serving of cheesecake or cookies because her younger sister ate them before she had a chance... well, that was just unthinkable. This was also the reason she'd slimmed down as much as she had. The thought of coming in second place was anathema to her, and that attitude came with her to gym class, academics, and every sport she played.

Melanie, by contrast, doubled down on her appetite. She seemed unable to end the day without being painfully stuffed, and everyday seemed to take more. Pretty soon, she was eating sun up to sun down, and the pounds started piling on to her gluttonous frame. Mel was outgrowing clothes faster then Emily, though due to her gains across the x and z axis as opposed to height. The pace that she put on weight was simply staggering, and more the once, Emily suspected she was intentionally gaining.

As her BMI went up, her physical abilities went down. Melanie had hardly been a track star before, but pretty soon hoofing it across her school left Mel red in the face and short of breath, to say nothing of gym class. Her classmates certainly never let her hear the end of it. If anything, though, that only seemed to encourage her to eat even more, and she gained faster then ever.

Even so, Mel's weight might have plateaued if not for the intervention of their mother, Cindy. For some reason Emily had never figured out, Cindy seemed to think her hoggish, growing daughter was the cutest thing ever, and getting fatter was unquestionably the best thing for her. Family meals became feasts, the bulk of it destined for Melanie's belly. Their house became packed with sweet treats and pop, and Mel was never allowed to go hungry.

If she was feeling full, Cindy had no qualms about stuffing her like a turkey.

If the stairs were too much for her, she'd bring her food upstairs.

As Mel grew, she convinced Dad to install a bathroom upstairs, oversized for their "growing girl."

When the school called, concerned about Mel's skyrocketing weight, she ignored them.

When Mel both outgrew her desk and crushed the teacher's chair in the same day, Cindy decided to home school her. And boy oh boy, did things sure spiral from there.

Every limitation of her appetite was overcome. Every hindrance imposed by her bloating physique was circumvented, exclusively by another's efforts on her behalf. Pretty soon, all her spoiled, coddled sibling could or would do was inhale an unholy deluge of calories, until she became... became...

"THIS."

Emily couldn't help it. Her sister had grown into nothing more then a disgusting blob of fat. She'd burst from her pajamas sometime during the night, leaving her huge belly exposed for the world, rising high above her, and stretching for both sides of the bed. She could still see grease stains on her overfed gut and hands, clear evidence (along with the trash on the floor) that Melanie had been stuffing her face while lying in bed last night.

"I don't even think she could pretend to stop eating," Emily thought, eyeing the blubbery thing before her. "Well, Mom said to wake her up, so let's wake her up."

*** *** ***


How does she wake you up?

Your heart hammered in your chest as you finished writing and saw the same glow appear in the text as well as fading away. Nothing happened for a few moments, but then you felt a blaze of warmth racing through your body, it almost felt like you were going to burst into flames at any moment. In any case, you didn’t much care at the moment, your hands roaming your body, from your turgid udders across your shifting belly to your meaty hips and rump.

So here…you know, you don’t have to go around naked like that this, you big fatty,” she said as she paused upon seeing you sitting there, a hint of sisterly playfulness in her voice.

The lunch she made of a cold cut sandwich and chips seemed rather meager for your body, an annoyed grumble from your stomach seemingly agreeing, but it would do for now, or would it…?

Grabbing a pen from within the drawer, you started writing out new things in the book.

First you made it so that neither you nor May would give birth, as well as making it so that neither you, May, nor any of the children in either of you would suffer any complications or problems from long-lasting and/or extreme pregnancies. That wish passed with nary a tingle passing through your body. Next, you wrote that you and May would be financially independent for the rest of your lives without dealing with any issues from the government and whatnot. A quick check of your bank balance on your phone showed that wish worked just fine too, bringing a wide smile to your chubby face.

“Now what else to do, what else?” you muttered to yourself as you tapped the pen on your lips.

As you looked closer at her stomach, you saw that it didn’t just look fat, it was more spherical than that might be, and as you watched, it moved; it seemed she was pregnant too, with at least a few by the looks of things.

“Not that I don’t enjoy your attention, but why are you looking so surprised?” she said with a sultry purr of a voice. “It’s not like you haven’t seen me naked plenty of times.” She then took on a more concerned note, “You feeling alright, baby?” putting her hand against your forehead.

You take her hand in yours – finding it wonderfully soft and warm against your skin – before saying, “Just fine, it still just amazes me that I got someone like you.” That was certainly true after all.

She giggled a bit, before placing her other hand on your cheek and tenderly caressing it, “Hmm…I still get like that sometimes, but most of the time I think we were almost made for each other,” eliciting a cautious chuckle from you.

She pulled her hand free of your grasp, and lightly run her claws down your body, focusing a bit around your breasts before continuing down to your stomach. She gives a toothy grin as her tender touch causes your triplets to become active again. Her touch sent a tingle up your spine, matched only by what you were feeling by being near her. But just like that, she stopped. As you reached out for her, she held up a finger and wagged it at you.

“You know I would like to continue this, but you also know I have to get going now. I only had enough time to get cleaned up after our fun earlier,” she said as she turned around, giving you a lovely few of her plump rump as she bent down and pulled out some clothes that hadn’t been in your dresser before you wrote that last bit in the diary.

Anyways I’ll go ahead and get started on dinner, a little early, I know, but after that lunch, I figured my big sister would be getting hungry.”

As you flicked through, you were actually getting a bit of a thrill seeing the dragoness dancing about or even swinging from the pole in some shots; it almost looked as if she was showing off just to you, and considering that you likely were taking all of these pics yourself, that could very well be the case. This brought a smile to your face as you put your phone aside, and settled in to watch TV, idly rubbing your hands over the turgid surface of your belly, feeling the now subtle motions within.

After a while of watching the boob tube – and hearing May being a real busy bee – you heaved your bulk up and onto your feet and made your way to the kitchen. Once there, you found that May had been preparing a veritable feast, certainly far more than she used to cook before you made the changes to both of you, but then, considering your considerable weight and how both of you were eating for multiples, it stood to reason that she would make a lot more food when she could. Before long, your sister shooed you out of the kitchen, since your “helping” her mostly consisted of eating anything you could; she did let you go with a platter of fresh fried chicken though. As you swaggered away with a mouthful of hot, crunchy, and juicy chicken, you thought about how much better May’s cooking was, even compared to how great it was before you changed things.

You had nearly finished with the chicken when May called you back to help carry everything out to the table. May was able to make two trips back and forth to the table for each one of yours due to her much smaller size, but between the two of you, the table was quickly completely covered by foodstuffs, and there still wasn’t room for everything she had made. You were initially flabbergasted by how much food your sister had made and in such a relatively small amount of time, but such thoughts were pushed aside as you dug in with gusto. May barely had time to get a small plate for herself before you started shoveling food into your mouth as quickly as you could; though you were going at such a high speed, you also made sure that all of the food made it into your mouth, not wanting to waste even a tiny morsel. May managed to get a second plateful when she took away some of the already empty dishes and replaced them with some of those waiting in the kitchen.

Eventually you slumped back in your chair – the furniture groaning under the load – and tossed the last slice of bread into your mouth after soaking it thoroughly with the gobs of gravy that clung to the final platter before you. Your shirt had slowly but steadily crept up the growing swell of your stomach, now exposing a hand width of your nearly spherical gut under the hem. May set about clearing the table before jumping in fright when you let loose with a thunderous belch; you were sure it was loud enough that you shook the windows in their frames.

Rubbing her own baby bump, May called back to you as she went towards the kitchen again, “Go ahead and head back to your room, I’ll bring up a bowl of ice cream like you like.”

You were briefly shocked at the thought of eating anything else, just as you were utterly stunned by how much you had already eaten, yet your belly grumbled in anticipation despite everything already packed away within. Getting to your feet was more difficult than it had been before, but you somewhat managed it, and wobbled your way to your bedroom. You had been expecting a small bowl, maybe a soup bowl, but your sister instead brought you a large mixing bowl absolutely heaped with ice cream, chocolate and caramel sauces, nuts, and whipped topping. With a wide smile, May set the bowl atop your stomach, the chill already seeping into your gut and giving you goose bumps. She held out a serving spoon with a wide smile till you took the offered utensil, and then took off, exclaiming “Enjoy!” over her shoulder.

Sitting up was almost as much a chore as standing up with your stomach so swollen with life and food, but the thought of something sweet spurred you on. Despite a portion of your mind recoiling from the thought of eating anything else, you again started the rhythmic process of shoving food into your waiting maw. Quickly, the chill moved from the surface of your stomach to deep within the churning cauldron within. The quickly melting sweet treat seeps into the cracks and crevices within your stomach, filling you up completely in a way that you had never known before. You toss the bowl onto your bedside table, barely missing the diary you had left there. You briefly think about using the diary, but settle for rubbing what little of your swollen middle you can; your unborn children were agitated as well, likely unhappy with how your food baby was shoving into them, and they responded with a flurry of tiny kicks and punches that further distended your stretched skin.

You briefly thought that everything stemming from finding that diary had been a dream, but that thought was dismissed by you feeling a flurry of motion that could only come from your womb-full of babies. Again, rubbing what little of your stomach you could, you felt a wide smile splitting your face in the darkness of your room. Only now did you think about what stirred you out of your food coma.

152332111.content:
You slowly walked between the stacks and shelves at a local antique and curio store. You were a frequent visitor to this particular store, often finding something unique and interesting to spark your imagination as a painter. As usual, you kept her waist length blood-red hair tied back to help prevent the thick locks from catching on anything that you might accidently pull off a shelf. Similarly, you avoided any loose hanging garments, opting for a somewhat formfitting low cut t-shirt with a corresponding pair of hip hugging jeans, both of which hugged and accentuated your buxom and voluptuous frame. Dusty and worn tomes, ornate furniture, and supposedly arcane items, none of it was doing anything for you today.

In the back of the store, the owner – an somewhat older woman who went by the name Tiala, but with never a sign whether it was supposed to be the given or family name – glanced up from her magazine every so often to cast a casual eye on your wandering, knowing how often you come to her store. As you made yet another lap around the store, she spoke up, “Ms Washington, if you can’t find anything to pique your interest, there is one more item that I just got in. I haven’t put it out yet. If you would like, I could bring it out for you to look at.”

“Sure,” you responded, to which Tiala nodded before moving behind the curtain behind the counter.

As you waited, you could hear her muttering to herself in the back, as well as scraping and clattering as she moved things around. After a bit longer, you heard her say “Ah, here it is.” Then raising her voice, “The woman who sold me this recounted quite an interesting tale about this item; she said that it started out in Egypt during the time of the pharaohs ages ago, and it has been spotted around the world in numerous other locations across the centuries.” Tiala stepped out through the curtain again, holding a small box in her hands. Setting it on the counter between the two of you, she continued, “After she left, I did some research of my own and did find some references and even images that seem to support her claims.” Reaching down, she flipped open the box revealing a gorgeous golden ring resting in the padded interior. “From what I can tell, the name associated with the ring seems to be the Ring of Life, but that is likely a very rough and inaccurate translation, of course.”

You tried to keep your face as straight as possible, knowing that Tiala often had some long and mystical story to go along with any of the items in her store, and most of those stores only possessed only the tiniest grain of truth, far less than the sprawling epics that they grew into. You could however see that there was an ankh as part of the ring’s shape, but that didn’t do very much to support the ancient Egypt angle since the symbol was still used commonly today. The ring did seem to show signs of age though, the metal worn and showing signs of extensive use. Despite that, there was something alluring around the ring though, it almost seemed to be calling out to you, making you want it more and more as you continued to look at it. It took a bit of effort to tear your eyes away from the ring and look back up at Tiala.

“I know that look, you want it, correct? I was thinking of putting it out for thirty dollars, but for you, my girl…I’ll tell you want, I’ll let you have it for a steal at twenty dollars.”

“Oh come on, Tiala, twenty dollars…for this? The ring’s tarnished and corroded, so I’ll have to clean it up before it will look halfway decent. I’ll give you ten,” fully knowing that this game was often played between you and her.

She knew the game just as well, “You wound me, Serah, giving me so little for such a quality item. But just to show there are no hard feelings towards you, I suppose I can maybe let you take it for fifteen, but no less.”

“Deal,” you responded with a bit of a smile, pulling the money out and slapping it on the counter, and scooping up the ring.

“Don’t you want a bag?” she called at your retreating backside.

“No thanks,” you called back, your eyes not leaving the ring in your hands.

Rubbing a finger on the surface, you find that the corrosion only seems to be a thin layer that easily came off. By the time you reached the front door, you had rubbed a decent portion of it clean, revealing much more brilliant gold than you were expecting. The calling seemed to be even stronger now, tempting you to put the ring on. With nary a though otherwise, you slipped it on, more than a little surprised that it fit your somewhat plump finger so well, almost as if it was made to your size. The ring felt oddly heavy for its size and the metal gave your finger a slight tingly feeling, but it wasn’t painful or even annoying, just something a little unusual. As you continue looking at the ring, you almost thought that you saw a reddish glow shifting around beneath the surface of the metal, but dismissed it as a trick of the light.
152332111.title: A find from antiquity

1523321111.content:
A loud yawn reverberated through your head, before a sultry voice started speaking, “Hmm…you’re not ideal for what I need yet, but you certainly have the potential.”

Looking around for the source of the voice, as well as seeing that Tiala wasn’t acknowledging the voice, you snapped out, “What, who are you, where are you?”

“Ah…I apologize for that, my dear. My location is currently inside your head, you put on my ring, and after a quick examination I found that you were one of the better choices I have seen for my vessel in quite some time, and so I awoke and made my presence known.”

Vessel? you wondered to yourself.

“Yes, vessel, and before you ask that, yes, I can also pick up your thoughts. As for who or what I am, I have been called many names over the eons, and been call many things as well: demon, goddess, blessing, curse, and so on and so forth. And as for names, there have been too many for me to keep track, but for the sake of simplicity, you can call me Dimarra, I suppose.”

You didn’t think you were going crazy, but maybe that was true for anyone that was going crazy. For now though you decided to play along.

So Dimarra, if you’re so ancient, why are you speaking in English?

“My dear, just because I have been reduced to a fragment of my former power residing only in that ring doesn’t mean that I can’t learn a few things, plus I have been able to learn quite a bit from connecting with your mind.” Her voice then took on a more thoughtful tone, “So much has changed in the world while I slumbered, and I don’t believe the people of your world are quite ready for my return, but that little issue will not matter, for I have returned in any case. First things first though, I will require more energy before I can get started. I do apologize in advance for this though, but it will be for the best.”

Before you could think or say anything about what this Dimarra spouted in your mind, you were overcome with a rush of heat and a blazing light that seemed to come from within yourself. You get a brief vision of a beautiful and seductive woman before darkness envelops your mind and you pass out.

+———+———+———+———+———+———+———+—â€ ”—+———+———+———+

You slowly came to, your head aching and more than a few odd tastes lingering in your mouth that made you feel almost sick. Groaning, you tried to remember what happened, but you got only a few disjointed images that didn’t fit together all that well. One thing you could be sure of is that you were no longer standing in Tiala’s store; instead you seemed to be lying down in your own bed, the familiar sounds, smells, and so on seemingly confirming your thoughts of home. Cupping your hand over your eyes to shut out the light, you almost dismissed the thought of Dimarra and all of that as some crazy dream, but then you cracked your eyes open just a fraction and saw that ring on your finger. Your eyes snapped open as you saw that you did indeed still wear the ring.

Another proof came as Dimarra’s voice spoke in your mind again, “Ah, good, you are awake. Again, I do apologize for all of that, but as I said before, I needed more energy. I had to shut away part of your conscious mind so that you wouldn’t interfere, but the more I have read of your mind, it seems like you most likely would have enjoyed what I did.”

What you did?

“I took the liberty of getting a large quantity food, the best way I have found of restoring my own energy after all. So many interesting flavors you people have come up with since the last time I awoke.”

Slumping your head sideways was a chore, but you did confirm that she somehow get a lot of food; the floor next to your bed was littered with empty pizza boxes, take out containers, cups and soda bottles, ice cream cartons and on and on, all of them were completely cleaned of any food stuffs. Well, that did explain the taste lingering in your mouth, all of that food mixing and traces remaining on your lips and tongue. But how in the world did she…or to be more accurate, you…eat it all?

“You’re having a bit of a hard time with this whole “goddess residing in your head” thing, aren’t you? But don’t concern yourself too much; most of the food was burned off when I changed you.”

Changed me? you thought as you bolted up, your sore head forgotten momentarily.

You found that Dimarra had indeed changed you, by quite a bit.

I must say, I rather enjoyed the look on the pizza boy’s face when he showed up and saw your body stuffing burgers into your mouth while paying for the pizza.”
