“What are you still doing here, Ms Washington? Wasn’t getting that ring at such a steal enough for you?” she asked with no hint of surprise at seeing you now as a fat anthro cow.

“Just…checking…myself out,” you managed to stammer out, pointing to the mirror.

“Hmm…well if you’re going to be ‘checking yourself out’ so much here, I might have to start charging you for it.” She then waved her hand and turned her back on you.

With your mind numbed at how she didn’t react to your change, you shambled out the door. Before the door shut though, you almost though you heard her say “Darn young’un almost caught her horns on the frame again.”

Out on the street, it was the same: no one seemed all that shocked at seeing an anthro cow. In fact, you were actually drawing more than a few lusty glances and double takes, mostly centered on your quad-breasts. After passing by a little restaurant, you heard one of the outdoor diners remark “Did you see that cow? I wish I had her confidence,” to her dining companion. You didn’t hear what the other woman responded though, as you were out of hearing range.

You were more than a little dumbfounded at all of this: first you were turned into an anthro cow and now no one thought it odd? How in the world did that happen? Did you hit your head and this was all a dream or what? Then you remembered the ring that you had just got and the odd sensation that had started in your finger. You thought about that for a moment but dismissed it because that was absurd, how could that little worn ring be responsible for all of this? Not that you actually minded it at all, come to think of it. During the course of your searching for inspiration for your paintings you had come across portions of the furry community and had grew to like some of the cow anthros you had seen, and your new form was quite thrilling if you were being really honest. You loved the way that your flesh shook just slightly with each step, and the way that your fur felt under your clothes or open to the air. The more you thought about it, the more you felt like you were happier with this body than the one from before. You weren’t sure how it happened, but you were definitely going to enjoy it.

Your happiness was short lived as frown crossed your face, realizing that you had no idea where you were. You hadn’t been paying attention to where you were walking, too lost in your mind. You thought you were walking home, but now that you thought about it, you hadn’t recognized many of the locations you had walked past. Rising far above you with the numerous windows gleaming in the sun was a tall apartment building. You’re not sure why, but you stepped out of the throng milling along the sidewalk and beneath the awning.

The doorman put on a smile as he saw you before saying “Welcome back, Ms Washington. Did you get anything for inspiration?” as he opened the door for you.

You fumbled for a moment, you had never met this man before and yet he knew about you looking for inspiration? It didn’t take you long to realize that this must have been another change: no more little cramped apartment for you apparently, you were moving up in the world…some how. Quickly recovering, you showed the man – Isaac, according to the nametag on his jacket – the ring and spent several more minutes talking to him before wishing him a good day and entering. Other staff members all recognized you just as Isaac had, even if you didn’t recognize them. Each of them wished you a good day or paid you a compliment or something along those lines, and you did your best to respond even if you didn’t really know them.

You eventually made it to the elevator and started to reach for a button before realizing that you had no idea where you lived here. Again though, something made you reach out and touch the topmost button, the one for the penthouse. The ride took a bit, giving you a chance to wonder again about what had caused your life to change so much. It didn’t really matter all that much, you supposed, it certainly looked like your life was much improved by whatever it was.

The elevator doors finally slid open at the top, admitting you to a small entryway. Beside the minor decorations, there was only one other door, presumably the door to your “new” home. Sure enough, the key in your pocket fit this lock and let you in. You shut the door behind you before turning around and getting a good look at your home.
152332111211.title: Not so shocking

1523321112111.content:
“Did you find anything to trip your trigger?” the voice called out.

“Y-yeah!” you shouted back, trying to figure out who the devil was in your “new” home.

Nothing else came from the other woman, leaving you some time to get used to everything. You explored for a bit, finding everything to be high quality and expensive to boot. From the kitchen that wouldn’t have looked out of place in a five star restaurant to the rooftop terrace with a huge pool and hot tub, you found everything to be almost straight out of a dream. You even recognized some of the art around the place. Some of them were favorites from your idols, while others were some of your own. Somehow they looked even greater here than you had ever seen them.

Then you came across a picture. It was taken on a beach, that much was obvious. Just as obvious was that it somehow showed you as a cow, as if the change had even applied in the past. Some part of your brain figured that you should have been more shocked at that. But you seemed to have reached some sort of maximum level for shock at this point. Much more interesting to you right now was the other woman in the picture.
1523321112111.title: Moving on up

choices: The lovely young woman in front of you
The beautiful view of the sunset over the city
15233211121111.content:
She was shorter than you. Her head only came up to the swell of your upper pair of breasts. The smile on her face was infectious, wide and dazzling. Both of you were in bikinis, though yours had the oddity of the twin top to account for the doubling there. Her dark hair cascaded down around her shoulders to a body that was rather generous with its curves. She was far curvier than you had been before this all happened, though because of her shorter height, she ended up looking even more rounded than you had. She looked positively radiant in the sun while you looked somewhat uncomfortable. The whole thing about fur in the sun might have had something to do with it. All in all, you thought she looked rather spectacular, and far outside of your league.

You jumped as a hand suddenly touched your back. Spinning around, you found yourself looking at the woman from the picture. She looked even more beautiful in person. Her smile was a little strained at the shock that must have been on your face, but that did little to diminish her loveliness.

“Honey, are you alright?” she asked.

With a shake of your head, you realized that she had asked that twice now. “Yeah, yeah, fine, I’m fine.”

She didn’t look convinced. “Are you sure, you look like you’ve seen a ghost.”

“It…it just feels like I’m in a dream or something,” you admitted.

That seemed to placate her, the strain vanishing from her face. “Oh, I get that way too, dear. My life has really taken a turn for the better since I met you.”

She then squashed against you, her considerable bust against your own to press her soft lips against yours. Your heartbeat felt like a jackhammer ready to burst from your chest.

The kiss broke apart, and she drifted back a pace. “Well, come on, show me what you got. It’ll be good for you to get over your block again.”

It took you several moments to realize what she meant. You then lifted your hand to show her the ring. She spent a bit of time looking it over and commenting on the wear and tear on it. You also noted that as she was doing so, she was also running her other fingers through some of your fur. You couldn’t tell if it was an unconscious or conscious act though. You supposed it didn’t matter either way, it felt rather pleasant truth be told.

“So, this ring giving you any ideas?” she asked, breaking you out of your thoughts again.

“Yes…yes, it is,” you said because the ring did provide something that got your creative juices flowing again.
15233211121111.title: Curves for days

choices: Looking up at the clock, you realize that you’re late for work.
There’s a knock at the door; a neighbor is there to welcome you.
Your concentration is broken when something really weird happens.
152332112.content:
With a groan, you fumbled for your keys while also trying to balance the shaky stack of boxes in your hands. Kicking the door open nearly caused you to fall over, but you managed to catch yourself just in time. Bobbing and weaving, you manage to see well enough to make your way to the table and finally set the stack down. Turning around and dusting your hands off, you take a good long look around your home. It’s…really cramped and in serious need of repairs, but it is your home lock, stock, and barrel; you had finally managed to save up enough to get your own place away from that sublet apartment with those horrible roommates. Shaking your head, you reached over to the light switch, only to jump away in fright as it expelled a large spark and gave you quite a jolt. You landed against the table hard enough to send the stack of boxes tumbling all over you. After lying there in a daze for a few moments, you groaned and started shoving the boxes – and their spilled contents – aside. Looking over at the switch, you grimaced and thought that you were now going to have to find the money to have someone look at that thing too.

Rather than dwell on that, you instead grumbled and turned your immediate attention to the piles that your life had amounted to so far. With a dejected sigh you started tossing things back into the boxes willy-nilly. You soon found your jewelry box, though it was mostly that in name only, since you own only a couple cheap pieces of jewelry, with the box mostly serving as a mobile junk drawer. You paused when you saw the glint of something shining within the mound. Digging down in you found a silver band with odd little runic designs along the outside; flipping it this way and that in your palm, you didn’t remember ever having anything like it. You shrugged, figuring that it may have been one of your roommate’s, and if so, it’s no skin off your nose. You dropped it – along with everything else from the little pile – into the jewelry box and set it aside, returning to putting things back into the moving boxes.

As you continued along, you kept finding your mind flicking back to the ring as well as your eyes straying to look at the jewelry box. Each time, you forced yourself to focus on the task at hand wanting to get done with cleaning up, but the compulsion got worse and worse. Eventually you walked back to the jewelry box and pulled the ring out, letting it lie in your hand, looking down at it. Realizing that there wasn’t any harm in it, you slipped it on, a little surprised at how warm it felt against your finger. Furrowing your brow, you thought that you saw a brief reddish glow within the band of metal, but dismissed it as a trick of the light before returning to the task of cleaning up.

With everything back in the boxes, you slumped down in the only chair you owned and finger combed your long hair out. You found yourself idly playing with the ring, your thumb spinning the ring around your finger, losing yourself in watching the designs go round and round. Something in the back of your mind kept ticking around with the idea that there was something very odd about this ring, but you mostly dismissed it as a little trinket with nothing special about it.
152332112.title: And so it begins

choices: …Vanessa, the barista who moonlights as a painter in her spare time.
…Scott, the writer who often settles in the coffee shop for inspiration.
…someone else, the place is a decently popular place after all.
1523321121.content:
You swore loudly as you saw the time, grabbing what you needed and running out the door, never noticing that behind you the light switch briefly glowed and ended up fixed within the span of a few seconds. Jumping in your beat-up car, you gunned it out of the driveway and headed off. Traffic was lighter than usual, but there was still enough that it ate up even more time. By the time you got near your workplace, you were swearing under your breath practically every second. Finding a parking place added on even more wasted minutes, so once you finally found a spot, you jumped out of the seat and ran down the road, running into more than a few people along the way, hearing shouted swears and other exclamations blooming in your wake. You nearly ended up running past the door in your haste, skidding to a halt and quickly rushing through the door to the Arkwright Literary Emporium.

Standing there in the entrance of the store, with hands on knees and your lungs burning as you gasped for breath, you slowly become aware of the familiar scents of the inks as well as the slightly musty smell that pervaded the entire building. Your boss and the owner of the store was seated behind the counter, as usual, barely looking over the top of the day’s newspaper at you, as usual.

It took you several attempts, but you managed to rasp out, “Sorry about being late, Mr. Arkwright. I…lost track of time.” You found that honesty was the best bet with the snowy haired old man; lying to his face was a surefire way to get on his bad side.

The paper drooped a little bit more, revealing the thin line of his mouth. One of the bushy eyebrows on his face arched high, before he looked up at the large antique coo-coo clock affixed to the wall behind the counter. Following his gaze, you felt your mouth drop in shock when you saw the time; you weren’t late at all, according to the clock – which Arkwright was sure to keep in prime working condition and was always correctly set – you were actually early, only by a few minutes, but still more than an hour earlier than it should have been. You gaped at the clock, your mouth opening and closing like a fish freshly pulled from the water as you tried to understand the time difference; maybe there was something wrong with the clock at your house? Without saying a word, the arched eyebrow dropped back to match its brother, before your boss slipped off of the stool, folded the paper, and went to the back of the store. Still too shocked by the oddity of how late you should have been you didn’t notice how he briefly looked back over his shoulder, his gunmetal gray eyes lingering on the silver ring on your finger.

Quickly pulling out your phone, you confirmed that the time matched up to what the clock on the wall said. Shaking your head, you forced yourself to accept that something must have been wrong with your clock at home, just something else that you would have to fix, that’s all. You took your place behind the counter, and pulled a book out from a lower shelf, opened it to where you left off and settled in for what seemed like just another day; the ring started spinning around your finger again as your thumb resumed absentmindedly toying with it.

You remained lost in reading a sprawling epic of science fiction, only briefly taking breaks to deal with the few customers that entered, till the clock behind you signaled that it was time for lunch. Calling back to Mr. Arkwright prompted him to amble back up with his newspaper still in hand and replaced you behind the counter, looking identical to how he did when you first showed up, hours before. Scooting out the door, you ambled down the street, much more composed compared to your mad dash earlier—even if you didn’t completely accept that your clock at home was set incorrectly. You stopped to briefly look in the window of a store and see a woman holding up a bra that was obviously too big for her, giving you a bit of a chuckle, though as you walked away the woman suddenly ended up with her breasts tearing out of her shirt as they ballooned in size well past what even that piece of lingerie would cover. At a sidewalk café, you overheard a woman complaining to her friend about how much she had eaten and how fat she was getting, even though she looked barely more than a size one; she rapidly ended up gaining more than five hundred pounds just as you turned the corner, the shouts and noise lost in the racket of the city around you.

You finally reached your favorite coffee shop; the coffee was good, the food nice, but the real reason that kept bringing you back was seeing…
1523321121.title: Run, run, run

choices: You thought about how much better she would look pregnant.
You wished she was buffer, more Amazonian.
You wondered about something else happening to her.
15233211211.content:
Very tall, tanned, leggy, and with a bust that you would kill for, the raven haired lass often wore outfits that further emphasized her curvy and voluptuous shape, and today was no different. Even mostly hidden behind the standard apron, you could tell that shirt was pulled tight around her body and the neckline was low enough to expose a bit of cleavage, while the jeans were taut around her shapely rear and stopped just below her knees to still expose plenty of her luscious legs. She almost always seemed to have a smile on her face whenever you saw her, but when she saw you it always seemed to brighten that much more; you hoped it was more than just an act to encourage you to keep coming back, and this hope was helped by the fact that she didn’t quite use it on anyone else.

Cheerfully, she greeted you, “Good afternoon, Sarah, your usual?”

You nodded, “Yeah, thanks Vanessa.”

She rang your order up, you paid, and you were soon finding a table with your order. As you slowly ate, your eyes kept daring up to look at Vanessa, and if it wasn’t your imagination, something was making her look your way a lot more often than usual too. On one of the glances, you thought about how nice it would be if she would cover over and ask you to join her in the backroom or something. You had finished off your sandwich, and were about halfway through your donut when Vanessa called over to one of the other girls behind the counter to cover for her. She slipped out from behind the counter and made her way through the bustling seating area, and stopped when she was standing over you, wringing her hands and looking around at everyone else. Looking up at her, you were more than a little struck by her beauty, with her hair hanging down her back in a wavy ponytail and the sunlight coming in the window across the room making it look like she almost had an aura about her.

She looked oddly tongue tied, but still leaned down and quietly said, “Do you…want to join me in the backroom?”

You paused with the last piece of donut hanging before your lips, more than a little stunned that she would suddenly come over and ask you that, especially with your thought just before. You tried to act nonchalant when you agreed, popping the donut into your mouth and washing it down with your cooling coffee. You followed her into the back room, and she shut the door behind you, and now looked even more nervous if anything.

Then she turns around and starts babbling, so you can only understand a portion of what she says, “Sorry about this, I don’t even know why I’m doing this, and it seemed like a good idea at the time.”

She cut her own rambling short by taking two quick steps closer to you, lifting your chin to look you in the eye, and then pressing her full lips to your own. Your heart fluttered as you felt it, and looked up at her, feeling the warmth of your lips pressed together, and the heat starting to radiate off of her. As the kiss broke, Vanessa stepped back, breathing heavily and looking almost as if a bit confused at what she just did. You, on the other hand, were left savoring the taste she left on your lips, as well as the wandering thought of how it would have been if she wouldn’t have to bend down to repeat it. With that thought, a tingle started in your hand, quickly spreading through your body, then you swooned slightly and got the oddest sensation; it was almost as if you were being stretched out. When it was over, you shook your head and then gasped when you saw that you weren’t looking up at Vanessa, you were now just as tall, and maybe even a little taller than her. When Vanessa recovered, she didn’t even seem to notice your increased height.

As you were left trying to comprehend what just happened to you, you realized that your eyes were stuck gazing at Vanessa, while a meandering thought shot through your head, quickly coming to the fore. Just as you focused on the thought for a moment, you saw that Vanessa was starting to change now too, though more drastically.
15233211211.title: The barista of your dreams

152332112111.content:
The thought of Vanessa being pregnant had flitted through your mind numerous times before, but those previous times were always fleeting and only idle fantasies. Now was completely different, they colored your every thought and wouldn’t go away. As you thought of the changes, you watched in awe as they become reality. Her stomach ¬starting out soft but mostly flat ¬ quickly started pushing out, widening the gap between her shirt and her pants. Hips started growing out, causing her pants to groan loud and louder with each passing second. Already large and weighty breasts expanded out, stretching the collar of her shirt and exposing ever more of the canyon of cleavage between the growing mounds.

As you watched her grow more and more, you saw how her skin took on more of a fertile glow, adding even more to the evidence that the woman before you has spontaneously become pregnant in the span of a few seconds, with no signs of slowing down. Soon, she was reaching full term with a child, and shooting past it so she quickly reached overdue, then on to overdue with twins and triplets in quick succession. Throughout the entire event, Vanessa had a dreamy look on her face, and was moaning like she was building to the strongest orgasm she had ever had.

The end came abruptly, her whole body swollen with new life, but still packed into the clothes she had been wearing before, though they were at their limits at containing her. It looked like she was overdue with quintuplets, though it was hard to be sure at this point. She had also gained a lot of weight, as if she really had been eating for herself and all of her children, probably overeating for everyone involved from how rotund she was looking. Her eyes were closed, her face retained that dreaming look, and she was panting heavily as her hands reached out far as they could, rubbing what little of her protruding stomach as she could, though most of the tanned orb remained far out of her reach. As you continued to watch, you could see lumps and bumps forming on her belly, obvious signs of active children buried within.

She barely seemed to be aware of what had happened to her, but it seemed like she enjoyed the sensations just the same. You have to wonder though, how will she take the shock of being so impressively pregnant so quickly.

1523321131221.content:
Your name is Madoka Akashi and you are a wonderful young girl. At only 25, you live in your own apartment in a town a little ways out of Tokyo, which was not that bad. You’ve dreamed of living in Tokyo but it was a bit too expensive and you just didn’t have the money. Your mother who raised you and your two younger twin sisters on her own wanted to help due to the amount of money the family has and the company that she owns but you didn’t want her to do so. You are a hard working young woman who is strong headed like your mother. You barely remember your father for he was barely there with your mother and left when she was pregnant with your younger sisters. Your sister’s names are Yuki and Yukari. They are both 14 years old and knew you can take care of them easily. They would occasionally come over and stay with you when they want and when your mother is out of town.

“Madoka, are you home?” Yuki asked.

“A note on her counter.” Yukari said.

You left a note for them saying you would be out for a bit when they get there. They got settled in and put your package on the counter. They found it outside your apartment door and found no return address. You soon came in and got everything put away.

“Good, you’re both home. Is your homework done?” You asked.

“We don’t have any. School was closed for some reason.” Yukari said.

“You’re so cute Yukari. I can’t get enough of both of you. I wish you were my daughters instead of my sisters.”

They told you that they found the package at your door. You opened it and saw a ring with a note. The note read:

“Madoka my love,

I got you this ring to be mine. If you accept, then I will love you forever.”

There was no name or return address so you couldn’t look it up. Yuki hen handed you an envelope that was from your mother. She said that no matter what, she wouldn’t take it back. You opened it and in it was ¥500,000 just for you. You smiled and took it. Yuki and Yukari got settled into your room for they wanted to sleep with you. You liked it and helped them get unpack for the time.

15233212212.content:
A loud scream echoed in your ears before Naomi collapsed atop you. Her dark skin was flushed and shiny with sweat, while her chest was heaving. You could tell that you were similarly disheveled, but considering what you just did that was understandable. Your lover’s eyes were growing heavy, you could see that now, and soon she drifted off to a well deserved sleep. You remained awake though, thinking about how much your life had changed recently. It all started with that antique necklace that Naomi bought from that shop for your two year anniversary. She only chose that trinket because she thought the small ruby in the center would compliment your own fiery hair, and that was true, but the necklace proved to be so much more than just a bauble.

The day after the two of you traded gifts and spent a long night celebrating, you did your usual daily task and went out looking for another job, preferably one above your barely livable paycheck now. Partway through the day, you stopped in your favorite coffee shop, but discovered that you didn’t have any money. As you turned to head back out, you wished that you had some cash. Suddenly there was a bright flash and your pocket was suddenly a lot tighter. Checking it out, you suddenly had a wad of bills almost bursting out. You were so shocked by it that you dashed out of the shop without getting the coffee and doughnut that you came in for.

Over the course of the following week, other odd occurrences happened. One of your favorite shirts that you had gotten a bit too big for was suddenly a bit larger than it had been. The pain of a stubbed toe vanished instantly as if it had never happened. A skimpy meal that you ordered one day was replaced by a massive feast. Your barely functioning clunker of a car that you were still making payments on was changed to a brand new car that was already fully paid off. The oddest one was where a employee at a shop whom was insulting you suddenly ended up weighing what must have been five hundred pounds more than what she just before, and she seemed to have no idea that she had ballooned to more than four times her weight in a single moment. She was also much nicer to you now too, as if her entire personality had changed to go along with her weight.

It didn’t take you long to realize that all of these occurrences seemed to be related to that necklace, especially since you weren’t able to trigger anything like that once you didn’t have Naomi’s gift with you. From that point on, you always kept the necklace with you except when you were sleeping; you weren’t sure if your dreams might be able to influence the magic or whatever it was, but you weren’t exactly willing to take the risk either. Further tests also revealed that you did indeed bend reality with whatever you changed using the necklace.

Soon enough, you traded your cramped little apartment for a luxurious penthouse. In addition, your nearly bottomed out bank account inflated to a point where billionaires would be envious of you. You even bought the company you used to work at on a whim. Despite everything though, you also made sure you were still relatively anonymous—or at least as much as you could be; you didn’t want hordes of paparazzi following you everywhere you went and everything else that came with being obscenely wealthy or famous. You were pleased to see that Naomi remained with you despite all of the changes you had made, and you didn’t even need to make any wishes or whatnot for that to happen.

Bringing your mind back to the present, you slipped out from under your lover. She stirred and mumbled in her sleep, but remained dozing. Goosebumps broke out across your pale skin as you left the warmth of Naomi behind, but you had finally worked up the nerve to do something. Reaching into the jewelry box where you kept the necklace, you felt the warmth of the metal and gemstone and found it encouraging. You looked back at Naomi for a moment, before slipping out of the bedroom and down the hall.

15233212212121.content:
In your mind’s eye, you saw your new form take shape: your own fleshy body now wrapped in deep red scales, darker than the ruby in the necklace. A thick tail spouted above the twin hills of your rump, while fingers and toes alike would be tipped with small claws, but you decided to forgo wings. Satisfied with what you saw, you willed the necklace to make it so. Even through your eyelids, you could see the bright flash of light. Slowly you opened your eyes and took in your new form. The scales were small and soft, yet still tougher than what your original bare skin had been. Your hands roamed your body, the claws gliding over the jewel-like scales that glimmered even in the dim light you stood in. It was quite a change, but it felt right as well.

A noise behind you suddenly drew you out of your thoughts. You didn’t even have time to turn your head before arms wrapped around your neck from behind. A soft breath tickled your neck as Naomi slipped her head atop your shoulder.

“Saw you were gone. What are you doing out here?” she asked sleepily.

“Just…admiring the view,” you responded, waving your arm at the nearby window showing the cityscape below.

“Yeah, I guess it’s pretty good. Not as beautiful as you though,” she said, slipping a hand down to tease one of your breasts.

Soon her caressing had the nipple atop the breast she was fondling hard as diamond and aching to be touched. She brushed her plump lips across the scales on your neck, moving up to your ear where she nibbled slightly. You could feel the heat of a blush spreading across your neck and cheeks again as she finally drew you back to the bedroom. Once there, she threw you back onto the bed and rewarded you for your work on her earlier. Using every trick she had ever displayed as well as a few new to you, she kept you a hairsbreadth from the edge for as long as she could. You almost passed out several times from the pleasure, but it was too enjoyable for you to want her to stop. Eventually she gave you exactly what you wanted, though you were so close that the slightest touch was enough to cause you to instantly crash over the edge. "It is. How may I help you?"

"We heard about you being part mammoth now and want to offer you a place when you potentionally become full mammoth."

You liked it and agreed. The place was at the state wildlife reserve which was a bit strange for a wooly mammoth. But you would be the first one in a few thousand years to roam the Earth alive. You got into a pair of sweat pants and a bra like top since that's all that you could easily get into and went out to the location. June went with and liked it. It was a couple hours away from home but it was better than nothing. They got to know you and showed you around. It was a large place and would allow plenty for you to roam in and eat. They would take great care of you while you're their resident mammoth.
1553222111121112221222211111321233111232.title: You get a call

1553222111121112221222211111321233111232.content:
You liked the area of the reserve you'll be living in and the life you'll be living. There was DNA of wooly mammoths that could be impregnated into you to use. No matter, you were settled into the area and living there freely. June liked it and so did your family. It was best and far easier than letting you grow and change in a city or other populated area. It's been a month since you were left there and was growing steadily bigger. You were also becoming more elephant each day until you felt it pushing full force now.

"Here we go." You said.

You got yourself ready and watched your tusks and trunk grow first. Your body began swelling up fatter and fatter as well as taller and longer. Eventually you were on all 4 legs and still growing. You liked how this feels and knowing you were in a great home, this was perfect for you. After a few minutes, you eventually stopped growing and changing. Taking a look at your reflection in the clear river, you saw you had become a full formed wooly mammoth. This was great and you hoped you would become a great new mammoth population in time and work, more would be born and grow.

"This is the new life for me. First in thousands of years to live and roam the Earth." You thought.

You went on with your life and people started comining through. You liked it and hoped that no one tries anything stupid. Of course you were quite large and powerful as is and would terrify anyone that disrupts your home.
1553222111121112221222211111321233111232.title: You finish transforming

15532221111211122212222111113212333.content:
You continued to enjoy life with your new wife without any problems. Though there was one thing you couldn't help doing, make June fatter. She was trying to lose weight but to no success. She kept trying but no matter what, she keeps gaining weight. It's been a couple months now since it was made official and things were still going well. Your family likes it, even if June was older than you. It was better than Yuki and that was a fact. Though Mira wasn't all that fortunately. Things turned down for her but fortunately she was on her way to the slaughter house to be properly taken care of.

"Have you thought of having kids or not?" You asked.

"I have a daughter who is actually on her way here. She's a bit off than the normal girl." June said.

"How so?"

"She's actually a they. The thing is that I have a pair of albino conjoined twins. They're joined at the hip from the hip up. You'll see them when they get here."

Around noon, they arrived. You let them in and saw an adorable girl. Taking a closer look and it was them. They were joined at the hip with a single pair of legs and one in front of the other. The twin in front was about to start crying when she looked at you but her twin sister wrapped her arms around her waist.

"Easy now, Noelle. That has to be Brooke." Nicole said.

"Is that them? Let them in." June said.

You took their bag and they came in. When they entered, June grabbed them and gave them a big hug. They liked it and loved feeling their mother's big belly. They got settled in and got to know you. It's been too long since June saw them and you just adored them. Noelle was the more sweeter and soft spoken twin and her twin behind her was more out going and louder of the two. They were quite rare as an albino and as a pair of conjoined twins as is but as both made them the only ones in the world. You promised to take care of them as best you could while they were around and they hoped you take care of their mother like you have. They didn't care if their mother was overweight or a lesbian now as long as she was happy.
15532221111211122212222111113212333.title: A couple months later

15532221111211122212222111113213.content:
...a wolf. That seemed a bit strange due to your current form but you felt it again. You looked back and saw your tail shoot out of the back of your pants. It was easy to move and on top, or currently sides of your head, your ears turned into wolf ears. Your heart raced a bit but your cousin settled it.

"Worry not Brooke. It's going to be alright." She said.

"Thanks Bri." You said.

She followed you out and made sure you were alright. She also put a necklace of sorts onto you before you completely transform or leave. The reason was that it was also a tracking device and an ID for when you completely transform. Bri then pulled up her phone to show she will always be watching you incase something happens or needs to find you. You hugged her before feeling a couple kicks.

"I guess you're also pregnant." Bri said.

"Might as well go eat for I'm starving and so are they." You said.

You left and went to your favorite diner. You got your order in and it came out soon after with a little extra. You ate it all and was satisfied but your children weren't. Since you wre a fairly regular, they let you order more. When you were finished, you paid and left. First Mira becoming a cow, then meeting June who almost became a cow, and now you were becoming a pregnant wolf. How much weirder could this get. For now, you just made your way home for the day.
15532221111211122212222111113213.title: A wolf

155322211112111222122221111132131.content:
You continued on with your life despite being a pregnant half wolf girl but that wasn't a problem. People admired how you look and you were becoming quite popular. Business picked up at the store just so people could get a good look at you. You liked it and it was all going well until your felt it happening again. Bri was in the store getting some stuff and was monitoring you. She came up and you rung her up.

"Don't tell me, it's happening again?" Bri asked.

"Definitely. I'm more concerned about the little ones." You said.

"They'll be fine. They have already changed."

You put your hand onto your belly and felt 3 sets of paws beating on your hand. That was good that they identified their mother and her touch before they were born. The feeling became stronger and fully engulfed you. You went into the back and Bri followed. Both of you heard popping and sounds of possibly bones breaking and reforming. You fell onto all 4 limbs as your arms and legs formed into proper legs. Your feet became back paws and fur went all the way up from them to your back. Your nose rounded out and it with your mouth started to elongate to a wolfs snout. It stopped there and that felt good. Trying to stand up on your back feet didn't work for you fell back onto all 4.
155322211112111222122221111132131.title: You transform some more

choices: You get released into the wild
1553222111121112221222211111321311.content:
You got use to walking around on all 4 paws and liked it. You had the urge to eat raw meat and saw Mira was even more tasty than usual. Mira didn't like that but she knew she was going to be food when she runs dry and fat enough. June took care of Mira the most now due to your limited ability to do so. You did what you could but it wasn't much. She got use to having a wolf around for she knew it was you. That's when you felt it happening again.

"Worry not Mira. I won't eat you until later when you're gone." You said.

"Moo!" Mira said.

She licked you and you felt and heard popping of bones again. Your arms and shoulders broke a bit and shifted into front legs and shoulders of a wolf. Fur grew and covered every inch of your body. Mira watched as it happen and hoped you were alright. It was a bit painful but you were alright. A couple minutes passed of this before it finished. Now a complete wolf, you got use to your new life. You stayed with Mira and waited for June. She came home that evening and saw you had fully transformed. She liked it and took care of Mira before taking you up to the apartment.

"Now to wait for the pups to be born." June said.

You curled up to her and waited. You couldn't wait for them to come and live great lives. She fed you and took great care of you and treated you like a normal dog instead of a wolf.
1553222111121112221222211111321311.title: You finish your transformation

15532221111211122212222111113213113.content:
You enjoyed being a wolf and the soon pack you were going to have. June enjoyed having you like this but knew she couldn't take care of a potentially wild animal. You understood and felt more and more of your wild instincts starting to take over a bit. So there was only one logical option and that was to be released into the wild. June took you down to see Mira one last time and enjoyed the last moments with her.

"Don't worry about Brooke here Mira. She'll be alright." June said.

"Moo. Moo, moo!" Mira said.

She licked you one last time before you were loaded into June's new car. She took you a ways out of town and into a nice forrested area. You jumped out and went with her a bit. She can tell you were a bit hungry but told you that you can't eat her, even if she did look like a tasty 400 pound meal. She took you to the right spot and said you were free to go. You left her and got to know the area. June stayed for a bit before leaving. You watched her to leave and didn't go after her.

"This is my new life. My pups would make my new life worth it." You thought.

You went out to hunt and started to track some rabbits. It took a bit and you soon found them. There were 3 of them and with quick movements, you got all 3 and enjoyed them. Eating things raw and fresh was amazing. You left only the bones and what you couldn't get off them and went on to find your knew spot to live.
15532221111211122212222111113213113.title: You get released into the wild

155322211112111222122221111132131131.content:
You enjoyed your wild life as a wolf and all that you can do. You were fending for yourself and your unborn children in the wide open world and don't have to worry about much. You knew Bri was still tracking you and the device had a large range. Its been a month since you became a full wolf and released to the wild and you were still loving it. Bri has came out to where you were primarely living at to check on you. She does this once a week and you loved the contact. Today was the day she was going to visit again and you were going to give birth. After bringing down a deer and devouring it, you heard a tone similar to a whistle. You went to the sourse and found Bri there waiting with a dog whistle. She wasn't alone. She had brought your family to help.

"Sorry about that, Brooke. Couldn't wait to see you." Bri said.

"Glad they could come as well." You thought.

Your mother got down next to you and felt your belly. You instinctively jumped away from her in protection of your belly. Despite it being your mother, you were still protective of your unborn. You settled down and let them feel your pregnant belly. A couple hourse passed before you feel it was time to give birth. You got ready and it soon began. It took a couple hours but they soon were born and latching onto you. Feeling them sucking on your felt great and you let them eat away. It was going to take a couple weeks before they were able to be taught what they needed to know to survive.
155322211112111222122221111132131131.title: You give birth

155322211112111222122221111132131133.content:
Life continued on and you enjoyed it. It's been 5 years since you became a wolf and released into the wild. You gave birth to a pair of boys and a girl which you liked. By the age of 3, the boys left and your daughter stayed with you. You taught her everything and she went with you everywhere you went. She liked it and wondered how long you and her could go without any males.

"Would you look at that, a pair of female wolves and right for taking." A hunter said.

"I don't think we should mess with them. I heard that 5 years ago a girl turned into a wolf and might be a vicious killer." The other hunter said.

"Don't be rediculous."

You knew they were talking about you and you decided to mess with them. You went up to them and acted like you wanted to go with them. When they were about to take you, you attacked. They tried shooting you but before either of them can, you brought down the first hunger and your daughter took the other one down. Once dead, you ate yours and she enjoyed the other. A couple hunters came to see what happened to their friends and saw the carnage. Feeling a little hungry still, they were the next meals both of you had. With full bellies, you and your daughter went on to enjoy the rest of the day.
155322211112111222122221111132131133.title: A few years later

1553222111121112221222211111321311331.content:
You continued to run with your daughter and live life in the wild. You have forgotten how to live a civilized life as a human and knew how to live life like a wolf now. You remember your life back then and all you knew. The one you still hate to this day is Yuki. But she's dead and gone while you're living your life still. Speaking of Yuki, you picked up and old sent you haven't smelt in years. You followed it and found a camp. Though this camp seemed a bit strange. In it was a large feast and most of it was raw with the old scent you love.

"There you are Brooke." June said.

You heard your daughter growling at the person behind her and you snapped at her. You then looked at the woman and didn't reconize her. After sniffing her a bit, you realized who it was. It was June and she lost pretty much all of her weight.

"This your daughter? If I remember correctly, you had three. Nevermind the other two, it's great to see you again." June said.

You gave June a good few licks and told your daughter who she was. She wagged her tail and licked her a bit as well. She brought you into her camp and you saw her daughter. She jumped at the sight of 2 wolves with her mother and she told her everything. This was the first time you got to meet June's daughter and liked it. They were out hunting like they use to which you didn't know she did. You decided to help them and got going. They liked it and tried not to shoot your or your child.
1553222111121112221222211111321311331.title: You find June

choices: You and Juniper go home with them
You bring down a large game
15532221111211122212222111113213113311.content:
You enjoyed seeing June again and meeting her daughter. She told you about Mira and how she was still going strong and as healthy as can be. You wish you could see her but who would want to see a wolf in a city. Of course you could easily be tamed and readjust to being a city dog but who knows about your daughter. You decided to name her Juniper and she liked it. Once every couple days you would pass by the camp site to observe whoever is there and occationally take something from them. It was funny to see their reactions when they realize they were robbed by a wolf.

"Someone knew has arrived, mother." Juniper said.

"I see. It's been years but that's my family." You said.

They knew you were turned into a wolf and released into the wild but didn't know where you were at. Bri does but hasn't checked lately. You slipped down into the camp while no one was looking and took their hot dogs and drinks before hiding in the tent they put up. Seeing them freak out trying to find them and jumping at seeing a wolf in the tent. Emma was the first to find you and she looked quite tasty with her fat body and such so you jumped on her and started licking her. Hanna had to pull you off and got a good look at you. Not going that easy, you began your sisterly assault on her as well. Followed after was Michel and May with your mother.

"Its great to see you as well, Brooke." Michel said.

"Definitely sis." Emma said.

You liked it nad your daughter came in to see them as well. They liked how adorable she is and how well behaved and trained she is. They told you that they did their best with the store and it was still going well but not as full on as it was with you. You were glad to hear that and how well everyone was doing. You and Juniper had some fun with them and watched over their camp at night. The next morning, they wanted to see how you and Juniper hunt for they heard both of you took down and ate 2 hunters each the other day. You let them and they followed you to a place where deer tend to pass through. You and Juniper waited with your family and soon they started to pass through. Both of you took off and took down 6 deer. 4 of which were left for you and Juniper while the other 2 were for your family. You and Juniper ate away as they are now and your family enjoyed the other two. It was great and you enjoyed it. They thought of brining you back but didn't know the law on housing wolves.
15532221111211122212222111113213113311.title: Your family visits

155322211112111222122221111132131133113.content:
`You liked seeing your family again and how well Juniper acted around them that you had hopes you might go home with them and with her. They came once a week to see you and liked it. Though they found they can't bring either of you home but had Bri and a wild life officer check on you once in a while as well. You and Juniper were the only two known wolves in the area and a new breed that they called the Brookiper Wolf. People would come all around to catch a glimps of you or Juniper as well as leave a bit of food for if they do. Both of you like it and ate everything given to you. Today you decided to take down a large game.

"You're really going to try it?" Juniper asked.

"I am. Might as well try." You said.

Juniper watched as you went after an elk. You knew there were plenty around and it wouldn't be a problem. This was the first time you ever went after an animal larger than a deer and alone. Juniper kept up just in case and you were doing quite well. It was trying to get away but you managed to get your jaws on its neck and brought it down. When it was dead, you let Juniper have some and she ate her fill. You finished it off and left only its bones and antlers with some of the unfinished bits behind. It felt great to take such a large animal down and eat so much.

"I think this is going to be a problem if you keep eating like this." Juniper said.

"I know but it feels great to have a full belly." You said.

You knew where this may go but it was a bit too good to stop. But someone has to control the increasing deer and elk population. You and Juniper were the only wolves in the area to do so.
155322211112111222122221111132131133113.title: You bring down a large game

1553222111121112221222211111321311331131.content:
You enjoyed the elk and went after another one the next day. Juniper enjoyed it with you and took another one down with you. It was a wonderful morning but it was going to become a better day. You made your way to your little home to find your mother there with Hanna. They looked at you and Juniper as you approched and smiled. They got down onto their knees and you knew that this was something good.

"Good you two came. We're taking both of you home with us." Your mother said.

"It's a nice place for both of you to enjoy." Hanna said.

You licked both of them and went with them. It took a bit to get Juniper to come with and into the car. Inside, Emma, Michel and May were all there and glad to see both of you. They took you to their new home and got out. Due to laws on animals, you and Juniper had to have collars and such on. You taught Juniper how to act like a domesticated dog and life in a city or town. She learned quickly and got adjusted to it. They own 4 acres of land which allowed you and Juniper to run around freely as long as you both return home at night.

"This is the life. No need to worry about them and get to live out our lives comfortably." You said.

"What about my brothers?" Juniper asked.

"Forget them. Us girls have it great."

That was good and hoped for the best. Proper meals every day and get to hunt when you want, it was good. By night, you cuddled up with May and was out like a light.
1553222111121112221222211111321311331131.title: Your family brings you home

1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.content:
You enjoyed the elk and digested it with ease. Juniper was out and hunting for herself leaving you alone for the day. You were hungry and found a good number of deer and a couple hunters. They took a couple down and you went after the ones getting away. They followed and helped bring you them down. They took them and you went hunting again. Eventually you got a few more in another area and started to bring them down. A couple got away but you weren't worried.

"Time to eat!" You said.

You began devouring them and like the others, left only the bones. You kept bringing them down and eating them. You noticed a couple signs of Juniper in the area and you liked it. After a couple hours of this, you were full but kept eating. There was no stopping this for it felt too good. Your belly kept growing bigger and bigger by the meal and was starting to slow you down and made it harder to run.

"There you are, mother." Juniper.

"Glad to see you as well. Get anything good for yourself?" You ask.

"I did but you were losing a bit too much of control."

"Couldn't help myself."

Juniper put her nuzzle to your belly and licked it. You made your way to your home with Juniper while taking down and eating a couple more. Juniper ate a couple more herself before arriving at home. It was great and you hoped to find more.
1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.title: You go on a spree

1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.content:
Life continued on for you and Juniper. You soon came to a realization on what's driving you to eat so much. You were pregnant and expecting 6 more young wolves. Juniper liked it and watched over you until you give birth. This was a bit strange but you liked it. You ate 4 deer a day and waited for the day they're born. The day you can tell they were going to be born, you made your way to the camp site your family usually used. They were there and saw how big you were.

"Come on Brooke. Get comfortable." Bri said.

"You better, sweetie. You're about due and shouldn't be straining yourself." Your mother said.

You did and Juniper still stayed by you. Eventually you started giving birth and your family helped as much as possible. One by one they came out and you loved them all. They didn't know how you became pregnant again without the help of a male but you were. Eventually they all came out and were looking for some food. They latched onto you and began sucking away. It felt nice and Juniper adored her siblings. Something feels off and you didn't like it.

"Eat up my pups. Each of you need it." You thought.

They did and were soon out next to you. Your family likes it and hope you and Juniper continue to grow your population. For now, rest until you were ready to go.
1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.title: A couple months later

choices: You turn the tides on them
1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.content:
You watched over your 6 new children and hoped the feeling you have isn't true. That would be soon realized. Juniper helped take care of them and how they looked. You kept thinking about the feeling and how it was persisting. A couple days passed since they were born and the feeling came true. You thought you might have eaten too much a while back before finding out you were pregnant with this liter of puppies or had something unplesant in you but that wasn't the case. Instead, you're new pups were going to eat you.

"That can't do that. Who'll raise them with me?" Juniper asked.

"You're on your own if they don't eat yoy as well." You said.

"If they don't, I'll take great care of them!"

You were their target and appearently the way of the Brookiper Wolves. Before they could, you went out and started fattening up for them. You told Juniper she could as well and she accepted if she could. You would miss this life but you couldn't live forever, human or wolf.
1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.title: Your feeling comes true

1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.content:
You continued to make yourself a tasty meal for your children while Juniper took care of them. After a couple days of doing so, you returned to them fat and ready. The 6 of them looked at you and you this was it. Juniper stayed clear and watched all 6 of them examine you and you got ready in case you decide to take them out instead. After a minute of them examining you, they made their attack.

"Take care, Juniper. If you see your two brothers that left us, kill them for abandoning family." You thought.

Each of them attacked and eventually brought you down. Juniper watched as their small teeth and claws dug into you. It stung and you wanted to fight back but couldn't. Eventually everything went black and you were done. Juniper continued to watch her siblings tear in and eat away at their mother. When they finished, only a few strands of your fur and your bones were left. They went to Juniper who started to take care of them.
1553222111121112221222211111321311331133.title: They eat you

choices: Reva has a little fun with you
You bring down a large game
1553222111121112221222211111321311333.content:
You enjoyed your life with your daughter and all that you get to do. Though it was a bit lonely without a pack of sorts to run with. While on another hunt, you found something interesting. It was another set of tracks that were neither yours or your daughters. Looking at it and the scent still on them, you can tell it was another wolf. You followed them until you found the wolf.

"You wouldn't be Brooke, would yo?" He asked.

"I am. Who are you?" You asked.

"You can call me Reva."

You checked him out and liked him. He liked how you look and how big you were. You told him that you were once a human before being turned to a wolf 5 years ago. You took him back to meet your daughter who was one of 3 children you had. She got to know him as well and liked it. In the 5 years she's been alive, you never gave her a name. You decided on Raven due to her darker fur compared to you. Reva loved you the most and you accepted him as your lover. He was wonderful and loved your beauty and maturity, especially if you were once a young human gone wolf. Raven liked it and hoped she could find one for herself as well.
1553222111121112221222211111321311333.title: You find another wolf

choices: Reva has a little fun with you
15532221111211122212222111113213113333.content:
You enjoyed life with Reva and Raven for they were enjoying life with you. You were made head of the little pack and hoped to make it a bit bigger in due time. One day while out looking for food, you smelt something big. It was definitely a large animal and tracked it for a while. Raven and Reva followed with and wondered what it was. Before long, you found the animal. It was a full grown elk and it looked tasty.

"I bet you could do it." Reva said.

"Definitely mother." Raven said.

"No doubt." You said.

You slipped around and got ready. You were the biggest of the three and went at it. It tried to escape but you managed to out run and attack it. It tried to get rid of you but you kept at it. Eventually it came down weak and beat from your assult. You made the final blow and it was done. They liked it and you let them eat as much as they want. They did and left the rest for you. You left nothing but the bones behind and loved it. You can't explain it but you are a massive eater for a wolf. If you haven't already, you would be gaining weight in due time.
15532221111211122212222111113213113333.title: You bring down a large game

155322211112111222122221111132131133331.content:
You continued to enjoy life and one thing you noticed. You noticed you were beginning to fatten up from the few large game you've ate and other stuff. You liked it but you can tell you were already bigger and heavier than other wolf species. Both of you and Raven were. You stood in at 3 feet 9 inches tall and Raven stood at 3 feet 2 inches tall. Before, you guessed you had to weigh in at 120 pounds and guessed you had to be 160 pounds now. No matter, more for you to use when hunting larger prey. Today, Raven went out to have some fun and bring down her own hunt.

"Now that Raven is out for a bit, lets have some fun." Reva said.

"Sure you can handle me?" You asked.

"If I can keep up with you and Raven, definitely could."

You liked it and could help with your population. You and Reva went at it and liked it. The feeling of being done by a boy after so long is great. Reva took the lead most of the time and you took it. Despite him being a grey wolf and you being an unknown larger wolf, you still went at it. There were plenty of grey wolves in the area, you, Raven and her 2 brothers were the only 4 known in the world. That is, if they didn't die yet. Reva soon finished off and releaved his love deep into you and hoped you could repopulate your species in time and with the help of Raven.
155322211112111222122221111132131133331.title: Reva has a little fun with you

1553222111121112221222211111321311333313.content:
After getting it on with Reva, you felt your belly growing bigger weeks later. Its been a few months now and you were clearly ready for birth. Raven liked it and due to your size, she and Reva were bringing you some game to eat. You liked it and would go out occationally with them but didn't hunt. Today you would try and hopefully you could bring it down. Reva was out doing who knows what and Raven was with you. She was worried for you and didn't want you to harm her siblings.

"Are you sure about this?" Raven asked.

"Of course. Can't just sit around and let the two of you do all the work." You said.

"You're pregnant and could give birth any day now."

"True but I'm still capable of taking care of myself and your mother who could do it."

You came across a couple deer and got ready. Raven went after one and you followed with. She took one down and got ahead of you. The reason was the couple extra weight of fat as well the pups within you. No matter, you caught up with the other one and brought it down. You and Raven enjoyed your deer and went to enjoy the rest of the day. You liked that you were able to do so and caught some food to eat.
1553222111121112221222211111321311333313.title: A few months later

1553222111121112221222211111321311333313.content:
You enjoyed the wild life and being a wolf and all but things soon changed after going on the hunt with Raven. It started with Reva never returning and finding him dead in a hunters camp. They tried to capture and kill you and Raven but you both got away. With him gone, that left the two of you left in the area. Its been a couple days since then and you heard someone coming.
